questions.question: Ikinyabiziga gishobora kugeza ku bugari ntarengwa bwa metero 2.75 ni igipakiye:

Ubugari bw’imizigo yikorewe n’amagare, na velomoteri na romoruki zikuruwe n’ibyo binyabiziga ntibushobora kurenga:
Mu byapa bikurikira , ni ikihe cyerekana umuhanda udakomeza:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ku bakoresha umuhanda:
Ibyapa bitegeka bishyirwa: Art 102

answers.answer: Ahantu birushijeho kubonwa neza n’abo bigenewe
Ku ntera kuva kuri metero 150 kugeza kuri 200

questions.question: Ubugari bwa rumoroki ikuruwe n’ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga kometse ku ruhande ntiburenga:

Ku mateme hagati y’ibinyabiziga bifite ibimenyetso byerekana umuvuduko ntarenga bidashobora kurenza hagomba kuba nibura:
Uburebure bwa makuzungu ntiburenza: art 57-2c
Mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa w’imodoka zidashobora kwikorera ibirenze toni imwe ni:
Uretse igihe icyapa kiberekana ukundi, uburebure ntarengwa ku mateme akozwe mu ngiga z’ibiti cyangwa imbaho ni:

questions.question: Guhagarara akanya gato cyangwa kanini ahateganye n’ikindi kinyabiziga gihagaze akanya gato cyangwa kanini bibujijwe ku muhanda w’icyerekezo kimwe iyo ubugari bw’umuhanda usigaye buba butagifite:

Igice cy’imizigo kirenga ku mpera y’inyuma y’ikinyabiziga kigomba kugaragazwa iyo imizigo isumba impera y’inyuma y’ikinyabiziga ho:
Iyo ikinyabiziga gihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini, hagomba kuzinwa:
Amatara yo kubisikana y’ibara ryera cyangwa ry’umuhondo, agomba nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye kumurika mu muhanda:

answers.answer: c.	Nibura muntera ya metero 40 imbere yikinyabiziga

quiz_meta.title: UMWITOZO WA 16

questions.question: Birabujijwe guhagarika akanya gato cg kanini ikinyabiziga ahadafite izi ntera kumpande zahashyizwe uruhombo amazi azimya umuriro:
Ibinyamitende velomoteur n’amapikipiki adafite akanyamitende ko kuruhande , bigomba kugira itara ndanga-mbere risa na :
Ni nde ugomba gukora uko ashoboye kose kugirango imizigo itagenda ibomborana mu kinyabiziga?
Iyo banyuze mu kayira kabanyamagare abanyamaguru bagomba kureka gusa aba bagatambuka:
Uburumbarare bw’ikinyabiziga gikururwa n’inyamaswa na romoroki ikuruwe nibyo ntibushobora kurenga izi ngero:
Imisumari mu muhanda y’ibara ry’icunga rihishije ivanaho agaciro ka:
Ikinyabiziga cyose kigenewe gutwara abantu bariha kigomba kwandikwaho, inyuguti zigomba kugira izi ngero:
Mu bimenyetso bimurika iyo harimo ishusho y’umunyamaguru cg igare ibyo bireba gusa:

answers.answer: D.	A na B ni ibisubizo byukuri

questions.question: Icyapa kivuga gutambuka mbere y’ibinyabiziga biturutse imbere kigomba kugira ibiranga bias na:
Romoroki zishobora gushyirwaho akagarurarumuri kamwe gusa nizifite ubugari ntarengwa bwa :
Ubugari bwa romoroki ntiburenga:

answers.answer: B.	Metero 1 na Santimetero 25 iyo ikuruwe n’igare
C.	Ubugari bw’ikinyabiziga kiyikurura iyo ikuruwe n’ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga kometse kuruhande

questions.question: Uturanga cyerekezo dutoranya twibara ryera dushobora gushyirwa :
Iyo banyuze iruhande rw’inkomyi abanyamaguru bagomba gukikira banyuze mu muhanda abayobozi bibinyabiziga basiga umwanya ufite:

answers.answer: A.	Ubugari bwa metero ebyiri ebyiri nibura hagati yabo n’inkomyi
B.     Ubugari bwa metero eshanu nibura hagati yabo n’inkomyi
C.     Ubugari bwa metero imwe n’igice hagati yabo n’inkomyi

questions.question: Ibimenyetso bigenga uburyo bwo kugenda mu muhanda bigizwe na :
Ibimenyetso byerekana imirimo munzira nyabagerwa bishyirwaho:

answers.answer: A.	N’umutwe wa police ushinzwe umutekano mu muhanda

questions.question: Amatara magufi n’amatara maremare agomba kuzima iyo ikinyabiziga gihagaze:

answers.answer: C.	A na B n’ibisubizo by’ukuri

questions.question: Ibyapa byerekana abagenda ibyo babujijwe cyangwa bategetswe  bimeze :
Iyo uduce tw’umurongo ucagaguye ari tugufi kandi twegeranya bivuga:
Iyo mu itara harimo ishusho y’umunyamaguru cyangwa yigare imuritse bireba gusa:
Ijambo inzira y’ibinyabiziga rivuga:
Umubare w’inyamaswa zikurura ikinyabiziga ntushobora kurenga:
Umuyobozi ushaka kugabanya umuvuduko w’ikinyabiziga agomba kubyerekana akoresheje:

answers.answer: B.	Amatara yo guhagarara cg ukuboko iyo ntayo

questions.question: Hagomba umuherekeza ukurikira  ku maguru akanyamizigo gakururwa iyo uburebure bw’imizigo gatwaye burenga:
Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye, bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200 mu nzira nyabagerwa ibinyabiziga bihinga bigomba kugaragazwa  ku buryo bukurikira:
Mu migi ubwikorezi ntarengwa bwemewe kuri buri mitambiko ibiri ikurikiranye ifungwaho ibiziga bine ni:
Mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa w’ibinyabiziga bitwarira abantu hamwe ni:
Umurongo uciyemo uduce umunyesha ahegereye umurongo ukomeje ushobora kuzuzwa n’uturanga gukata:
Iyo inzira nyabagerwa idafite inkengero iringaniye n’umuhanda cyangwa hatagendeka ingorofani zinyuzwa:
Iyo umuhanda ugabanyijemo ibisate bibiri kandi ugendwamo mu byerekezo byombi umuyobozi abujijwe:
Ikinyabiziga kigendeshwa na moteri n’ikinyabiziga gikururwa n’inyamaswa ntibishobora :
Ijambo inzira nyabagendwa bivuga:

answers.answer: Imihanda nyabagendwa yose igendwamo ku butaka

questions.question: Ijambo inzira y’ibinyabiziga bivuga:
Ijambo akayira bivuga:

answers.answer: Inzira nyabagendwa ifunganye yagenewe gusa abanyamaguru
Inzira nyabagendwa ifunganye yagenewe gusa ibinyabiziga bigendera kubiziga 2

questions.question: Ijambo remoroki ntoya bivuga:
Ijambo igare bivuga ikinyamitende:
Imyaka fatizo kubayobozi bari mu nzego A na C ni :
Umuyobozi agomba kwerekana uruhushya rwo gutwara ibinyabiziga ako kanya  arubajijwe na:

answers.answer: N’umuyobozi ushinzwe amateme n’imihanda muri iyo fasi

questions.question: Ibitegekwa n’umukozi ubifitiye ububasha:
Kuzunguza Intambike itara ritukura bitegeka:
Ijambo akagarura rumuri bivuga:

answers.answer: Akantu karabagirana gasubiza imirasire y’urumuri kukiyohereje

questions.question: Imyaka fatizo k’umuyobozi w’ibinyabiziga biri mu nzego A na B ni:
Isonga y’impombo yohereza ibyotsi ntishobora kwerekezwa :
Birabujijwe gutwara ku ntebe z’ikinyabiziga umubare w’abantu urenze umubare wateganyijwe na:

answers.answer: A.	Umutwe wa police ushinzwe umutekano mu muhanda

questions.question: Umuyobozi agomba gushobora guhagarika ikinyabiziga cye akurikije ibi bikurikira:

answers.answer: A.	Aho ageza amaso n’imbere y’inkomyi idatunguranye

questions.question: Iyo imirimo cyangwa inkomyi biri ahantu hatoya hagati ya mugitondo na ni mugoroba bigomba gushyirwaho ibimenyetso bikurikira:

answers.answer: B.	Utubendera  dutukura dufite nibura cm 50 z’uruhande
A.	Utubendera dutukura dufite nibura cm 15 z’uruhande
C.	Utubendera tw’umuhondo dufite nibura cm 50 z’uruhande

questions.question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye, bitagishoboka kubona muri m 200 ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri bitari velomoteri n’amapikipiki adafite akanyabiziga ko ku ruhande mu nzira nyabagendwa bigomba kugaragazwa na:

answers.answer: A.	Imbere ni itara rimwe ritukura

questions.question: Uruhushya rwagateganyo rufite agaciro ku nzego zose z’ibinyabiziga uretse:
Inkombe z’inzira nyabagendwa  cyangwa z’umuhanda zishobora kugaragazwa:
Mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa w’ibinyabiziga bitwarira abantu hamwe ni:
Imirongo yera yambukiranya umuhanda igomba kuba ifite ubgari buri hagati ya:
Ibyapa byo ku mihanda bigomba gushingwa ku ruhande rw’iburyo bw’umuhanda kuburyo umusozo wo hasi udashobora kuba munsi ya:
Icyapa kivugako aho kiri hatanyurwa n’ibinyabiziga bifite uburemere burenze ubwerekanwa n’ikimenyetso gifite ubuso bw’ibara rikurikira:
Mu mugi ubwikorezi ntarengwa bwemewe kuri buri mitambiko ibiri ikurikiranye ifungwaho ibiziga bine ni:
Iyo umuhanda ugabanijemo ibisate bibiri kandi ugendwamo mu byerekezo byombi umuyobozi abujijwe :
Hakenerwa umuyobozi w’unganira umuherekeza w’ikinyabiziga iyo umubare w’inyamaswa zikurura urenga:
Iyo akanyamizigo gasunikwa cyangwa ibyo gatwaye bituma umuyobozi abona neza imbereye agomba:
uburebure bw’ibinyabiziga bikururwa n’inyamaswa ukuyemo ibituma zikururana ni:
Ibimenyetso bikoreshwa kugirango berekane impera y’imyuma y’imizigo bishyirwa kubuhagarike bwa:
Ibitegekwa n’abayobozi babifitiye ububasha:
Ibinyabiziga ndakumirwa birangwa:
